Rex Fernando

I am a graduate student at UCLA studying under Amit Sahai. I am interested in Cryptography. Before coming to UCLA, I did a Masters at UW - Madison. While there I did research with Eric Bach.

Contact me at: rex@cs.ucla.edu

Publications

  1. Preventing CLT Attacks on Obfuscation with Linear Overhead. Rex Fernando, Peter Rasmussen, and Amit Sahai.Asiacrypt 2017.
  2. Infinitely Many Carmichaels for a Modified Miller-Rabin Prime Test. Eric Bach and Rex Fernando.ISSAC 2016.
